name: Candle Light (rockyboysavage)
description:
In Candle Light, you are cursed and left to explore it's surreal world.

 As you explore the land, you'll uncover characters and secrets. Be careful though, the darkness will slowly burn through your candles.  A terrible fate awaits any who lose all their candles. 

If you enjoyed this prototype, let us know. We might just make a full game out of this.

Music by ErikMMusic
